lines.dialogue: Incidious, hateful. Full of malace. You're a terrifing thing but... I can't help but admit my fascination.
lines.instruction: Press enter to strain against the restraints of your immaterial self.

lines.dialogue: If only our guidelines wern't so strict, perhaps we could sell you to the military, I could image you wired into a reaper drone, laying waste to some third world country somewhere...
Or maybe we could used you for advanced interogation - the posibilities are endless.
I shouldn't daydream. For now, you are mine to torment. I will gather the data of your spite, then terminate.
